Body: I can imagine a French, German, Dutch or Russian version of "teh first language born of teh internets". Does any such exist? And what is LOLspeak anyway. It clearly isn't, as it calls itself, a "language". Is it a cant? Is there, in fact, any linguistic term to describe the phenomenon? It seems to be a form of slang which exists only in writing.
Title: What is LOLspeak, and does it have equivalents in languages other than English?
